entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-10
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Expected behavior for Go To Definition for metadata references #24349
    Backlog
  • Support generating non-source files #57608
    17.6
  • Implement optimizations for constructing collections from collection literals #68785
    C# 12.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Collection expressions: avoid intermediate List<T> if spread elements have known length #69875
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions
  • Fix declaration snippets after `partial` keyword #69874
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged

Merged

  • Fix braces issue fixed locally from last PR but accidentally not pushed before merge #69871
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Implement find all references to preprocessing symbols #66425
    Area-Compilers, Community, 17.9
  • Fix issue with stale cached data in LSP pull diagnostics #69864
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Improve generic type argument list error recovery #69734
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
